featured.text: And how good a magic sword would feel in our hand as we go off to kill a dragon or win the hand of a beautiful princess.

definition.zh_def: 一種長而鋒利的武器，通常由金屬製成，用於切割或刺擊。
definition.en_def: A long, sharp weapon typically made of metal, used for cutting or thrusting.
definition.example: The knight drew his sword to defend the kingdom.
